snippet: An all-survivors soccer team led by Erison Turay was made to bring Ebola survivors together and create a new community from the shared pain of the past.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Erison Turay, founder of Kenema Ebola Survivors Football Club, which consists entirely of survivors of Ebola outbreak in Sierra Leone; Turay formed soccer team in hopes of dispelling stigma that continues to affect those who have survived disease.
lead_paragraph: An all-survivors soccer team led by Erison Turay was made to bring Ebola survivors together and create a new community from the shared pain of the past.

headline.print_headline: In Sierra Leone, Giving the Stigma of Ebola a Good, Swift Kick
headline.main: In Sierra Leone, Giving the Stigma of Ebola a Good, Swift Kick
